question: 8 (a)
statement_html: Write down the first five terms in a Taylor series expansion of the function \(\displaystyle y = f(x) = e^{x}\) about \(\displaystyle x=0\). (Note: If you remember this series, you are not asked to derive it).
statement_latex:
Write down the first five terms in a Taylor series expansion of the
function $\displaystyle y = f(x) = e^{x}$ about $\displaystyle x=0$.
(Note: If you remember this series, you are not asked to \textbf{derive}
it).
statement_raw: Write down the first five terms in a Taylor series expansion of the function <math> \displaystyle y = f(x) = e^{x}</math> about <math> \displaystyle x=0</math>. (Note: If you remember this series, you are not asked to '''derive''' it).
